sentences.sContent: If don't clean my room,my mother won't____me meet my friends.
sentences.sContent_eng: If don't clean my room,my mother won't____me meet my friends.
sentences.sCn: 如果我不清理房间，我妈妈不让我见我的朋友。

sentences.sContent: I could clean my room and then ask if I could go to the party.
sentences.sContent_eng: I could clean my room and then ask if I could go to the party.
sentences.sCn: 我会整理好自己的房间，然后问妈妈我是否可以去参加聚会。

sentences.sContent: For example: "I'm really angry at Mom because she won't let me go to the party until I clean my room.
sentences.sContent_eng: For example: "I'm really angry at Mom because she won't let me go to the party until I clean my room.
sentences.sCn: 例如：我真的很生气，因为如果我不整理好房间，妈妈就不让我去参加聚会。
